languages.text: "Прошу, не надо тратить дыхания. Мое решение окончательно".
"Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, не надо тратить дыхания. Мое решение окончательно".

traits.locale_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you do not waste your breath. My decision is final."
"Please, I kindly ask that you do not waste your breath. My decision is final."
"Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."
"Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."
"Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."
"Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

languages.text: "Ich bitte Euch freundlich, verschwendet nicht Euren Atem. Meine Entscheidung ist endgültig."
languages.original_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte Euch freundlich, verschwendet nicht Euren Atem. Meine Entscheidung ist endgültig."

languages.text: « Je vous en prie, ne gaspillez pas votre salive. Ma décision est prise. »
languages.original_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en prie, ne gaspillez pas votre salive. Ma décision est prise. »

languages.text: “拜托，希望您别再浪费口舌了，我是不会改主意的。”
languages.original_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

traits.locale_text: “拜托，希望您别再浪费口舌了，我是不会改主意的。”

languages.text: 「どうか、これ以上は止めないでくれ。俺はもう、決めたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

traits.locale_text: 「頼むから、無駄な議論をするのはやめてくれないか。これは最終決定なんだ」
「どうか、これ以上は止めないでくれ。俺はもう、決めたのだ」

languages.text: «Por favor, le ruego que no pierda su tiempo. Mi decisión es definitiva».
languages.original_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

traits.locale_text: «Por favor, le ruego que no pierda su tiempo. Mi decisión es definitiva».

languages.text: "Rica ederim nefesinizi boşa harcamayın. Kararım kesindir."
languages.original_text: "Please, I kindly ask that you not waste your breath. My decision is final."

traits.locale_text: "Rica ederim nefesinizi boşa harcamayın. Kararım kesindir."
